options.name: Weapon Collector
options.description: You are adept at managing multiple weapons in combat. You can use complex weapons in your extra weapon slots.

options.name: Action : Disarm
options.description: You make an attack with a melee weapon against a target that is also wielding a weapon in their hands. Instead of making a normal defense check, the target must make a coordination check greater than or equal to half your attack check, rounded down. If the target is dazed, stunned or impaired, your attack check is not halved.

options.name: Action : Follow-Through
options.description: You make a combination attack with two different weapons. First make an attack with a complex weapon, then immediately make an attack against the same target with a brawling attack, throwing weapon or simple weapon as part of the same action. Both attacks are mitigated separately.

options.name: Tactical Fighter
options.description: Your diverse weapon training has improved your battlefield awareness. Gain +1 skill with logic. When making a defense check against a creature that is using a simple or complex melee weapon, gain a bonus dice.

options.name: Training
options.description: Your extensive weapon training has honed your reflexes. Gain +1 skill with coordination. When using the attack action, you can use your coordination skill with a penalty dice as your attack check. These weapon attacks are not eligible for critical hits and cannot be used as part of other actions or reactions.

options.name: Master at Arms
options.description: Your knowledge of weapon construction and maintenance is extensive. Gain +1 skill with fabrication. You can study a weapon for an hour to learn how to make it and avoid the first time craft penalty.

options.name: Action : Find the Gap
options.description: You search for a gap in your opponent's defenses by rolling a coordination check against their defense. If successful, you make a weapon attack with a penalty dice against that same defense check, but the physical damage cannot be mitigated. This does not affect creatures with traits that halve or are immune to physical damage.

options.name: Weapon Master [A]
options.description: Gain +1 skill with complex melee and simple ranged weapons.

options.name: Weapon Master [B]
options.description: Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons and throwing weapons.

options.name: Effortless Weapons
options.description: Complex weapons are no more difficult to handle than simple ones for you. The amount of energy you use to attack with a complex weapon is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 0.
